items.content_html: The Currency Converter is a lightweight and user-friendly tool designed to quickly convert between different currencies. The application fetches real-time exchange rates using a reliable API, ensuring accurate and up-to-date conversions.
items.title: Bishal-5/Currency-Converter: The Currency Converter is a lightweight and user-friendly tool designed to quickly convert between different currencies. The application fetches real-time exchange rates using a reliable API, ensuring accurate and up-to-date conversions.

items.content_html: ThingJS 3D Engine (t3d) is a lightweight, web-first, and extendable 3D rendering library.
items.title: uinosoft/t3d.js: ThingJS 3D Engine (t3d) is a lightweight, web-first, and extendable 3D rendering library.

items.content_html: A lightweight, open-source web browser extension for adjusting volume and equalizing sound. Built with performance and efficiency in mind, it's designed to work seamlessly on both high-end and low-end hardware. Contributions and pull requests welcome!
items.title: ChristianE00/AudioKit:  A lightweight, open-source web browser extension for adjusting volume and equalizing sound. Built with performance and efficiency in mind, it's designed to work seamlessly on both high-end and low-end hardware. Contributions and pull requests welcome!

items.content_html: This project is about a basic implementation of "DND Kit". DND is a lightweight, modular, performant, accessible and extensible drag & drop toolkit for React.
items.title: lvleo21/react-dndkit-poc: This project is about a basic implementation of "DND Kit". DND is a lightweight, modular, performant, accessible and extensible drag & drop toolkit for React.

items.content_html: React Social Media App is a lightweight web application built using React.js, designed to facilitate posting and viewing of user-generated content. Users can create new posts by filling out a form that includes fields for user ID, post title, content, number of views, and tags.
items.title: rishibharadwajsai/social-media-app: React Social Media App is a lightweight web application built using React.js, designed to facilitate posting and viewing of user-generated content. Users can create new posts by filling out a form that includes fields for user ID, post title, content, number of views, and tags.
